Line.MultilineString: "Often in the wild the places you will adventure will be filled with obstacles that get in your way."
"The way to deal with these is to SMASH THROUGH THEM!"
"Just match orbs next to the obstacle to destroy it, and soon you'll have nothing blocking your way."
"Give it a try. Just smash all the crates in this room."
"Well that was a disappointing effort. Come back tomorrow and try again. Next time with more vigor!"
"Cathartic isn't it, smashing things to smithereens. Sometimes things may take multiple hits to break, so if at first you don't succeed, smash and smash again."
